title: Portable Recovery Software Collection 2016-06-16
description:
Portable Recovery Software Collection 2016-06-16

About this release

This collection includes the latest versions of the most efficient commercial solutions to recover files and partitions.

You might want to merge this collection with my first release of Portable Recovery Software Collection 2016-06-14: https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/14925403


All applications are registered and/or patched, you will be able to run them from any location (folder, USB drive)
Most of the applications were virtualized using the latest version of VMWare Thinapp, which ensures they run on any Windows version (tested on Windows 10 64-bit)
These home-brewed VMWare USB versions do not write files nor registry entries to the host computer, they deploy all necessary data to a subfolder along the executable
Some applications are system specific (x86/x64), some will run on both systems
Automatic updates and internet connections were disabled whenever such options are made available in the program's option (disallow internet access if necessary)
All files were scanned with ESET Smart Security (updated 2016-06-16)
Size (unpacked): 0.7 GB

Included in this release

DiskDigger 1.8.0.1701 (Natively Portable)
Essential Data Tools AnyReader 3.16 Build 1130 (ThinApp)
Essential Data Tools FileRescue Professional for FAT & NTFS 4.14.221  (ThinApp)
iCare Data Recovery Pro 7.9.0.0 (ThinApp)
IsoBuster Pro 3.7 Build 3.7.0.0 (ThinApp)
Lazesoft Data Recovery for Windows 4.1.1.13 (Thinapp)
Recuva 1.53.1087 Professional (Natively Portable)
Seagate FILE RECOVERY for Windows 2.0 (ThinApp)
Stellar Phoenix Windows Data Recovery Professional 6.0.0.1 (ThinApp)
Blade Forensic Data Recovery Professional 1.12 (by FC Portables)
TestDisk & PhotoRec 7.0 (Natively Portable)

Bonus - Free software

Wise Data Recovery 3.8.4.201
